title: A good movie to take a nap.
review: This is my first review on IMDB and I'll make it short.Do not believe the hype. Scariest movie of the year? Well, I fell asleep because it was sloooooow and booooooring. The intro was very promising but it went downhill very fast.. So don't blow your money in the cinema and wait for it to come out on Netflix or something. You can thank me later..

title: Let your great expectations float..
review: I'll make this short and sweet;Save your money and wait for it to come out on Netflix. The movie starts off promising but soon falls into scary clichÃ©s and dull moments. The storyline is all over the place and CGI just awfull..
